semantic_identifier: 137: feat: Setup: add Fit Driver preview + field mapping step with workspace-level persistence

sections.text:
## Description

This PR adds a new step to the Fit Driver setup flow that lets users preview and map the underlying source fields/events before completing setup.

Key changes:
- New “Preview & map” step after Fit Driver selection.
- For each selected Fit Driver, we surface top candidate bindings (e.g., CRM property, event name, survey question) with:
  - sample values
  - fill-rate/coverage metrics
  - ability to swap/select an alternate candidate
- Selected bindings are persisted per workspace as Fit Driver mappings so future ingests reuse the same field/event/question without requiring remapping.

Implementation (high level):
- Backend:
  - Added endpoints to fetch candidate fields/events per Fit Driver and compute lightweight coverage metrics + sample values.
  - Added workspace-scoped persistence for Fit Driver → source binding (including source type + identifier) and wired ingestion to resolve bindings from this mapping.
- Frontend:
  - Added a setup wizard step with per-driver mapping UI and validation (must have a valid binding to continue).
  - Updated setup completion to save mappings and prefill them on subsequent runs.

User impact:
- Users will see an additional step during setup where they can confirm/adjust the data source behind each Fit Driver.
- Once saved, mappings are reused automatically for that workspace on future ingests.

## How Has This Been Tested?
